Package com.w10.risk_game.models

Class Continent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.w10.risk_game.models.Continent
  • public class Continent
extends Object
    The Continent is a model class The Continent class represents a continent in a game, with properties such as continent ID, name, list of countries, list of neighboring countries, and bonus points.
    Author:
    Omnia Alam, Darlene-Naz

      • toString

        public String toString()
        The toString() function returns a string representation of the continent's ID, name, and bonus.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        The toString() method is returning a string representation of the object. It concatenates the values of the d_continentId, d_continentName, and d_bonus variables, separated by spaces.
